meanings.english_definition: The 11th month of the Islamic calendar.

examples.sentence: Zulkadah is one of the four sacred months in Islam.
examples.translation: ズルカダはイスラム教における4つの聖なる月のうちの1つです。

etymology.value: From Arabic ذُو ٱلْقَعْدَة (ḏū al-qaʿda), meaning "the one of sitting" or "the one of resting". This name refers to the fact that during this month, people would refrain from traveling and warfare.
